topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554feb376368721fad3f0500#post_554feb376368721fad3f0500
I'm trying to find a terminology for my personal philosophy when it comes to things so I can phrase my political beliefs and such better.

What I mean by this is that when it comes to controversial subjects or any philosophy or such it can be summarized by "I don't believe in anything; things can be true or false and what people say have a possibility of being true, but until evidence one way or the other comes up I won't say it's fact and until then everything is merely opinions." or better put "unless something has evidence of being fact it's just theory".
